job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the task of gathering business needs and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence explicitly mentions researching, prototyping, and building AI/ML driven systems, referencing core modeling components like LLMs and vector databases.

job_tasks.phrase: building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the core activity of creating AI solutions using various models.

job_tasks.phrase: build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of software components and user-facing features.

job_tasks.phrase: rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping is a key part of the software development lifecycle, especially in R&D.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the collaborative implementation and integration of prototypes into production applications.

soft_skills.phrase: Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem.
Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
Work with other engineers across the company

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building AI-driven solutions with LLMs and vector databases, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The focus on researching, prototyping, and developing user-facing features powered by generative AI models confirms this classification.
